title: The Best Stage!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Fuu.... We’ve come here yet again, huh.... Harajuku. There is a considerable amount of magical energy spreading through the ground in this spot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh!? Harajuku is that kind of place!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ordinary people wouldn’t realize it, obviously. It’s an immense amount of dark energy that only this Yohane can take in<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No way.... I’ve never known that. Is it.... dangerous if we stay here for an extended period?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>As long as you’re near Yohane, it’s fine. But when you’re alone just as a little demon.... There’s no telling what would happen<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I come here often with Honoka and Kotori, but should I refrain from doing so in the future?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... It’s okay, from today, Yohane shall absorb all the magic that comes out from this place<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re able to do that!? To be honest, I’ve been skeptical about you, Yoshiko, but I’ve changed my view about you. Please make this place a safe place for us all to play in. If there’s anything I can do to help, I will do so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kuukuku. There’s nothing you can do as a little demon. Also, it’s Yohane, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m.... powerless, huh.... I understand. I’ll be in your care, Yohane<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
